UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Author: Roncević T, Cikes-Culic V, Maravic A, Capanni F, Gerdol M, Pacor S, Tossi A, Giulianini PG, Pallavicini A, Manfrin C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=>32µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>32µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=>32µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=>32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=>32µM),Human chronic B cell leukemia MEC-1(no activity data),Human bladder carcinoma T24(IC50=>100µM)
